# About Me
👨‍🔬 **Kamal Chhetri**  
PhD Student | Plant Pathology | Virginia Tech University

Welcome to my GitHub site! I specialize in **machine learning** and its applications in plant pathology—including fungicide efficacy testing, metagenomics, and pathogen detection in corn disease research. My work focuses on using **bioinformatics** and **statistical analysis** to develop decision-support tools for effective agricultural disease management.
